questions.quote: Oh, I'm gonna give you a Royal bearing. Wait a minute, wait a minute. Lemme get a pack of gum here.
Hey. Oh, Jerry, listen uh, you know, I saw the rest of that movie, The Other Side Of Darkness? The coma lady wakes up at the end.
Yeah, that's what you did...I can't believe I got another session with Izzy Mandelbaum, he's probably makes me box a kangaroo.
I think that ginger ale at the coffee shop is just Coke and Sprite mixed together. How can I prove it? Ah! Can't, dammit.
Drink your soda! Come on! I know you're there, laughing at me. Laughing and lying and laughing! I had to go to Reggies, Jerry! Reggies!
It's not contest. The guy had nothing! The ship went down, he got into a life boat, I mean, come on.
You raise the hand, lower the head-- "I'm sorry, I'm sorry. The buttons are really big on the car. I don't understand it. I haven't read the manual. Ooh!" You get my drift.
So everyone will know everybody's name. See, people are gonna be a lot friendlier.
Yeah, but you gotta order it two days in advance.  You know, I'm gonna call him, I'm gonna order the duck for you.
Oh yeah. It's a warm and wonderful feeling, Jerry. So what are you doing later?
